text:
Pelham Cemetery (City Island, Bronx): The entrance to the cemetery on the east side of King Avenue between Ditmars and Tier Streets.

Summer, 1923

P. L. Sperr

(2)

An extensive view of the cemetery, seen from Long Island Sound.

P. L. Sperr

July 26, 1928
title: Cemeteries - Pelham Cemetery - City Island - Bronx.
